function.name: GetDisplayMode
function.comment: Retrieve information of a display mode.

input.param: Index of the display mode to retrieve.

description.p: This function returns the width, height and depth of a given display mode.

function.result: An xrMode structure is returned or NULL on failure.

function.name: GetDisplayTotal
function.comment: Returns the total number of display modes.

description.p: This function returns the total number of known display modes.

function.result: Returns the total number of known display modes.

function.name: SetDisplayMode
function.comment: Change the width and height of the display.

input.param: The required width of the display.
The required height of the display.

description.p: This function changes the width and height of the display to that indicated by the Width and Height parameters. If the requested size does not match a known mode, the closest matching mode will be chosen.
